channel.title: Opthium718 - 742 Loading | 11 Custom Bosses | Nex | Various of Minigames | 25 Sk
channel.description:
[img]http://opthium.com/images/logo.png[/img]
Play webclient: http://opthium.com/webclient.html Highscores: http://opthium.com/highscores Auto-donate: http://opthium.com/donate
Features:
- 11 Custom bosses - 25/25 Skills working - Prestige system up to 10 prestiges - Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time - 2 Quests - All the Matrix minigames and 3 others made by me - Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture - Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har'lakk the Riftsplitter or his minions) - Loyalty Points & Pk Points - The Abyss 100% like RS - Full Living Rock Caverns - Clue Scrolls - Over 20 NPC caves - Penguin Hide and Seek
Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QdX0tX1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IdE1WOb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pPqZkJM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yhYxUpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CZ8KzS4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UauPwW3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/feDemN3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fxmtPTZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GxTbHem.png[/img]

Features:

  • 11 Custom bosses
  • 25/25 Skills working
  • Prestige system up to 10 prestiges

  • 2 Quests

  • Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture
  • Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har’lakk the Riftsplitter or his minions)
  • Loyalty Points & Pk Points
  • The Abyss 100% like RS
  • Full Living Rock Caverns
  • Clue Scrolls
  • Over 20 NPC caves
  • Penguin Hide and Seek
